snippet.title: Nightingale - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer Game Fest 4K
snippet.description:
New gameplay from shared-world survival crafting game, Nightingale. Unlock the infinite possibilities of realm travel using the power of the Realm Cards. Explore the portal network, and build a life in the Faewild.

Wishlist Nightingale on Steam and Epic Games Store today:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928980/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=SGF
Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/nightingale 

Sign up at https://www.playnightingale.com/ for news and playtesting updates. 

About Nightingale:

Nightingale is a first-person, PVE, open-world survival crafting game played solo or cooperatively with friends. Build, craft, fight and explore as you venture through mystical portals into a variety of amazing and fantastical realms.

Nightingale Twitter: https://twitter.com/playnightingale
Nightingale Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playnightingale
Nightingale Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playnightingale
